    • world

      BlockSnapshot.Builder world(ServerWorldProperties worldProperties)
      Sets the ServerWorldProperties for this BlockSnapshot.

      This is used to grab the UUID of the World for this snapshot.

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      This builder, for chaining
